tags.label: css-observe
tags.description: Fire a custom event whenever an element matching a specified selector is added.

attributes.label: id
attributes.description: Required (unique within ShadowDOM realm) for anything to happen.

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: Nothing happens if this attribute/property is present/true.

attributes.label: observe
attributes.description: This attribute/property must be present/true for anything to happen.
